label: A10B3_oF52_42_2abce_ab-001
title: W$_{3}$O$_{10}$ (WO$_{3} \cdot \frac13$H$_{2}$O) Structure
comments: The designation of this structure is somewhat confusing.  (Gerand, 1981) call this structure WO$_{3}$$\cdot$$\frac13$H$_{2}$O, more properly written as W$_{3}$O$_{9}$$\cdot$H$_{2}$O, but they do not give the positions of the hydrogen atoms, which are presumably associated with the O-V [O(2) in (Gerand, 1981)] atoms.  Without further guidance we have left the hydrogens out of this study.
